weights.explanation: Set a fixed probability that charts of each difficulty level will be drawn.

check.title: Prevents very unlikely outcomes (e.g. multiple 17s drawn when at 10% chance)
check.label: Force Expected Distribution

group.title: All charts at a this level or above will be weighted as part of a shared "bucket".
group.label: Group top end charts starting at

controls.constrainPocketPicks: Pocket picks must match draw options
controls.playerLabels: Show player & round labels on draws
controls.invalid: Couldn't draw anything with current settings!

en.confirmClose: Are you sure you want to leave?
en.updateReady: Update ready, refresh for the freshest code around!
en.about: App inspired by work from Jeff Lloyd. * Weighted distribution code contributed by Chris Chike. * Jacket images prepared by FuriousDCSL. * Japanese localization made possible by nalpan. * DRS data provided by Joseph Bowersox. * SDVX data made possible by Vincent Nguyen. * Order songs by Protect/Pocket Pick feature by Ornrumpa Kanchanomai and Thanh Dang. * Pump it Up data sourced from PUMPOUT, maintained by AnyhowStep and Haru-kaze. * Maintained by Noah Manneschmidt, aka Cathadan.

contact.prompt: Please reach out with feedback, ideas, or code contributions:

weights.explanation: 各レベルごとに数字で出やすさの重みを付ける

check.title: 「17に10%が設定されている状態で17が2つ以上ドローされる」というような非常にまれな結果を除外
check.label: 厳密に設定を反映する

controls.useWeightedDistributions: レベル別に確率を設定する
controls.invalid: 対象譜面がありません！

ja.confirmClose: 本当にこのページを離れますか？
